feature.label: PNML Framework Utils and Runtime
feature.provider-name: Sorbonne UniversitÃ©s, Univ. Paris 06, CNRS UMR 7606 (LIP6)
feature.description: PNML Framework is a library to help Petri Net tools handle Petri Net Markup Language models, compliant with the ISO/IEC 15909 Standard. It thus enables them to create, save, load and fetch PNML models. NB: This plugin requires Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF). Therefore, you must also point the Eclipse update manager to EMF's update site, or use Eclipse Modeling Distribution. This feature brands the runtime API.
